english.segment1: Convinced of my deception. I've always been a fool. I fear this love reaction. Just like you said I would
english.segment2: A rose could never lie. About the love it brings. And I could never promise. To be any of those things
english.segment3: Chorus: If I was not so weak. If I was not so cold. If I was not so scared of being broken. Growing old. I would be.. I would be.. I would be..
english.segment4: Blessed are the shallow. Depth they'll never find. Seemed to be some comfort. In rooms I try to hide
english.segment5: Exposed beyond the shadows. You take the cup from me. Your dirt removes my blindness. Your pain becomes my peace
